017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Objects;
026
027import java.util.function.Function;
028
029/**
030 * A {@link JavaType} with a flexible means of describing its direct
031 * supertypes, suitable only, probaly, for CDI use cases.
032 *
033 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
034 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
035 */
036public class CdiType extends JavaType {
037
038
039  /*
040   * Instance fields.
041   */
042
043
044  private final Function<Type, Collection<Type>> directSupertypesFunction;
045
046
047  /*
048   * Constructors.
049   */
050
051
052  /**
053   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
054   *
055   * @param type the {@link Type} being modeled; must not be {@code
056   * null}; must be a <a
057   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#legal_bean_types"
058   * target="_parent">legal CDI bean type</a>
059   *
060   * @param directSupertypesFunction a {@link Function} that, when
061   * supplied with a {@link Type} (which will be the {@code type}
062   * parameter value), returns those {@link Type}s which are its
063   * direct supertypes; must not be {@code null}
064   *
065   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
066   */
067  public CdiType(final Type type, final Function<Type, Collection<Type>> directSupertypesFunction) {
068    super(type);
069    this.directSupertypesFunction = Objects.requireNonNull(directSupertypesFunction, "directSupertypesFunction");
070  }
071
072
073  /*
074   * Instance methods.
075   */
076
077
078  /**
079   * Returns an {@linkplain
080   * Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection) unmodifiable and
081   * immutable <code>Collection</code>} of the <em>direct
082   * supertypes</em> of this {@link CdiType} as provided by the
083   * {@linkplain #CdiType(Type, Function)
084   * <code>directSupertypesFunction</code> supplied at construction
085   * time}.
086   *
087   * @return an {@linkplain
088   * Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection) unmodifiable and
089   * immutable <code>Collection</code>} of the <em>direct
090   * supertypes</em> of this {@link JavaType}; never {@code null}
091   *
092   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
093   * return {@code null}.
094   *
095   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
096   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
097   *
098   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
099   * idempotent and deterministic, though the ordering of elements
100   * within returned {@link Collection}s is undefined
101   */
102  @Override
103  public Collection<JavaType> directSupertypes() {
104    final Collection<Type> directSupertypes = this.directSupertypesFunction.apply(this.object());
105    if (!directSupertypes.isEmpty()) {
106      final Collection<JavaType> c = new ArrayList<>(directSupertypes.size());
107      for (final Type type : directSupertypes) {
108        c.add(of(type));
109      }
110      return Collections.unmodifiableCollection(c);
111    }
112    return List.of();
113  }
114
115
116  /*
117   * Static methods.
118   */
119
120
121  /**
122   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
123   *
124   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the type to model; must
125   * not be {@code null}
126   *
127   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
128   *
129   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
130   *
131   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
132   *
133   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
134   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
135   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
136   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
137   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
138   * invocations are equal.
139   *
140   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
141   * threads.
142   *
143   * @see #of(Type)
144   */
145  public static final CdiType of(final Token<?> type) {
146    return CdiType.of(type.type());
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
151   *
152   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the type to model; must
153   * not be {@code null}
154   *
155   * @param box whether autoboxing is enabled; <strong>must be {@code
156   * true} because CDI requires autoboxing</strong>; see {@link
157   * JavaType#of(Token, boolean)} which this method shadows
158   *
159   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
160   *
161   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
162   *
163   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code box} is {@code false}; CDI
164   * requires autoboxing
165   *
166   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
167   *
168   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
169   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
170   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
171   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
172   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
173   * invocations are equal.
174   *
175   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
176   * threads.
177   *
178   * @see #of(Type)
179   */
180  public static final CdiType of(final Token<?> type, final boolean box) {
181    if (!box) {
182      throw new IllegalArgumentException("boxing is required by CDI");
183    }
184    return CdiType.of(type.type());
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
189   *
190   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
191   * {@code null}
192   *
193   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
194   *
195   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
196   *
197   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
198   *
199   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
200   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
201   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
202   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
203   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
204   * invocations are equal.
205   *
206   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
207   * threads.
208   */
209  public static final CdiType of(final Type type) {
210    return new CdiType(type, JavaTypes::directSupertypes);
211  }
212
213  /**
214   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
215   *
216   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
217   * {@code null}
218   *
219   * @param box whether autoboxing is enabled; <strong>must be {@code
220   * true} because CDI requires autoboxing</strong>; see {@link
221   * JavaType#of(Type, boolean)} which this method shadows
222   *
223   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
224   *
225   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
226   *
227   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code box} is {@code false}; CDI
228   * requires autoboxing
229   *
230   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
231   *
232   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
233   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
234   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
235   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
236   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
237   * invocations are equal.
238   *
239   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
240   * threads.
241   *
242   * @see #of(Type)
243   */
244  public static JavaType of(final Type type, final boolean box) {
245    if (!box) {
246      throw new IllegalArgumentException("boxing is required by CDI");
247    }
248    return CdiType.of(type);
249  }
250
251}
